ygData.subject: RE:  Lambent
ygData.msgSnippet: don t worry Martyn, that is one of the most outrageously prices asked i have seen.  MAYBE the breastplate could be sold for that, and that is considering
ygData.messageBody:
don't worry Martyn, that is one of the most outrageously prices asked i have
seen. MAYBE the breastplate could be sold for that, and that is considering
crafted bp's go for around 1k. though i have yet to see any actual prices
for lambent armor as of yet, your offer was much more in line.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L29 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L21 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: "Josh Moore" <josh@...>
>
> Some brain dead Bard twink on the Mithaniel Marr server Was
> selling Lambent
> gauntlets today. was taking offers. I offered her 250 for
> them. she said she
> was only taking serious offers over 2k.
> Please please please.. no one, no matter how much money you
> have to burn,
> buy ANY lambent for that price. they are not THAT hard to get.
> (Mumbles about greedy money grubbing people)
>
> -Martyn
> Mithaniel Marr
